Module AM08

Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.exceptions
     
  • Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    This is the abstract class that handles the client server side
    Lobby
    This class represents a Lobby to be sent to the client as part of a list
    LobbyRecovered
    This class represents a Recovered Lobby
    LobbyServer
    This class sets up the main server which will make the player set his name and choose a game to join
    LobbyServerConfig
    This class contains all the information for the correct setup of the server It can also be loaded from file
    LobbyStandard
    This class represents a Standard lobby
    MatchServer
    This class represents the server that manages a game
    RmiClientHandler
    This is the class that handles the tcp client server side
    RMILobbyServerInterface
    This interface contains the methods that can be called by the client on the Lobby Server
    RmiServerInterface
    This interface contains the methods that can be called by the client on the MatchServer
    TcpClientHandler
    This class manages all the inbound and outgoing communication between the client and the server
